bill.summary:
Clean Energy Victory Bond Act of 2018
This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to issue Clean Energy Victory Bonds. The proceeds from the sale of the bonds must be deposited into the Clean Energy Victory Bonds Trust Fund and be used to carry activities of the Department of Energy's Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy.
